title.en: Ethereum Pectra Upgrade Scheduled for Q1 2025
title.zh: 以太坊 Pectra 升级计划于 2025 年 Q1 进行

summary.en: Ethereum developers have announced the Pectra upgrade timeline, which includes EIP-7251 (max effective balance increase) and EIP-7702 (account abstraction improvements). This upgrade aims to improve validator experience and transaction efficiency.
summary.zh: 以太坊开发者公布了 Pectra 升级时间表，包括 EIP-7251（最大有效余额增加）和 EIP-7702（账户抽象改进）。此次升级旨在改善验证者体验和交易效率。

title.en: SEC Delays Ethereum ETF Options Decision
title.zh: 美国 SEC 延期以太坊 ETF 期权决定

summary.en: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has delayed its decision on Ethereum ETF options applications, extending the review period to evaluate potential market impact and investor protection measures.
summary.zh: 美国证券交易委员会推迟了以太坊 ETF 期权申请的决定，延长审查期以评估潜在市场影响和投资者保护措施。

title.zh: Firedancer 测试网上线，实现 100 万 TPS

summary.en: Jump Crypto's Firedancer validator client has successfully launched on testnet, achieving over 1 million transactions per second. This new implementation promises to significantly improve Solana's network performance and reliability.
summary.zh: Jump Crypto 的 Firedancer 验证者客户端已在测试网成功上线，实现了每秒超过 100 万笔交易。这一新实现有望显著提升 Solana 网络性能和可靠性。

title.zh: Solana Mobile Chapter 2 预订量突破 10 万台

summary.en: The second-generation Solana Saga phone has surpassed 100,000 pre-orders, demonstrating strong community support for Web3-native mobile devices and expanding the ecosystem's reach to mobile users.
summary.zh: 第二代 Solana Saga 手机预订量已超过 10 万台，展示了社区对 Web3 原生移动设备的强力支持，并将生态系统扩展到移动用户。

title.en: Arbitrum Stylus: Support for Rust and C++ Smart Contracts
title.zh: Arbitrum Stylus：支持 Rust 和 C++ 智能合约

summary.en: Arbitrum has launched Stylus on mainnet, enabling developers to write smart contracts in Rust, C++, and other WASM-compatible languages alongside Solidity, offering 10x performance improvements and lower gas costs.
summary.zh: Arbitrum 在主网上推出了 Stylus，使开发者能够使用 Rust、C++ 和其他 WASM 兼容语言编写智能合约，与 Solidity 并行，提供 10 倍性能提升和更低的 Gas 费用。

title.en: Polygon 2.0 Roadmap: Transitioning to zkEVM-based Architecture
title.zh: Polygon 2.0 路线图：过渡到基于 zkEVM 的架构

summary.en: Polygon has unveiled its 2.0 roadmap, focusing on transitioning the entire ecosystem to zero-knowledge proof technology. The upgrade includes the POL token migration and a unified liquidity layer across all Polygon chains.
summary.zh: Polygon 公布了其 2.0 路线图，重点是将整个生态系统过渡到零知识证明技术。升级包括 POL 代币迁移和跨所有 Polygon 链的统一流动性层。

title.en: Avalanche9000 Upgrade Reduces Subnet Creation Costs by 99%
title.zh: Avalanche9000 升级将子网创建成本降低 99%

summary.en: The upcoming Avalanche9000 upgrade will dramatically reduce the cost of launching and maintaining subnets, making it more accessible for developers to build custom blockchain solutions on Avalanche.
summary.zh: 即将到来的 Avalanche9000 升级将大幅降低启动和维护子网的成本，使开发者更容易在 Avalanche 上构建定制区块链解决方案。
